name: JUST ANOTHER TERRIBLE SPACE SHOOTER
description:
THE MOST AMAZING SPACE SHOOTER EVER!!!

awesome things about it:

-you can't shoot (it's so unique!!!!)

-your highscore doesn't get saved (who cares about those anyway)

-the graphics are terrible (it will run on any computer)

-the developer barely play tested it (it's gonna be like being a play tester!!!!)

-the music repeats over and over (you'll always remember the tune)
